website_summaries.verdict: Experienced woodworkers will appreciate owning a SawStop quality cabinet saw at a much lower price. Relatively easy to assemble in a workshop.
pros: Saw is engineered well, and the blade guard system is praiseworthy
Factory settings are accurate upon arrival
cons: Assembly bolts are a combination of metric and standard sizes

customer_reviews.title: Great saw - Hardware to assemble was short in quantity
customer_reviews.text: The saw is incredibly accurate and a pleasure to operate. Overall, from uncrating, assembly and turning the switch on, about 6 hours. I took my time to make sure everything was accurate. That also includes a trip to the hardware store to get some nuts and bolts that were shorted. This was irritating along with purchasing the chord and plug to connect it to our shop electrical. I am happy with the purchase but it is a bit overpriced when you add in the trip to the hardware store for fasteners and the electrical chord and plug. Thanks Amazon delivery for setting the saw in my shop...great delivery service!
customer_reviews.author: Regis C.

customer_reviews.title: Went together very well except a little disappointed with the nuts and bolts some were metric and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this saw. Went together very well except a little disappointed with the nuts and bolts some were metric and some were sae in the same bag. The extended fence table is also substandard but does not effect saw operation. All critical measurements and alignments were dead on from the factory. I am willing to overlook the quality of the bolts and extended fence table because the saw itself is great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and powers through anything you push through it.
customer_reviews.text: Love the power moving up from a traditional tablesaw. Everything adjusts smoothly, accurately and with ease. I think the only thing you will hate is setting it up. But well worth the time. This cuts through any exotic hard wood I've put through it at the max height with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey quinn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome saw!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. I love those saw, and the packing and shipping was top notch. Took me about two hours and I had it all assembled and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Mcmurray

customer_reviews.title: Has plenty power.
customer_reviews.text: Great saw. I build custom cabinetry and I haven’t been disappointed. Thanks Jet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table saw. Been using for a few months now. Can't go wrong with this product. Cuts great.
customer_reviews.author: todd seaman

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding saw!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome replacement for my ancient Craftsman contractor saw. The saw works great and very powerful. I did have to shim the extension wings slightly during set up. I've already ran a dado set on it and it's excellent. Great purchase and the shipping company delivered it right into my workshop.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Taitt

customer_reviews.title: Great Saw
customer_reviews.text: Great Saw! Very solid. Great fence. New guard design is great, easy to remove and reinstall. I have actually made every one of my cuts with a guard or at least the riving knife. Dust collection is good. Table is flat and nicely machined. I was debating between this saw and the PM2000, but I could not justify the price difference. I had a Bosch 4000 prior to this saw, the upgrade was well worth the cost. This machine is solid and very powerful. I recommend this saw for anyone in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I received the saw and it was all I expected. I haven't had a chance to use it that much but I have no doubt it will work great for years. No problem putting it together and delivery was great. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this new in the box off Craigslist. More saw than what I thought I needed. Now that I have it I love it. It is perfect for my home work shop. I would definitely buy this saw again from Amazon for $2400.00.
customer_reviews.author: Drew A Hinners

customer_reviews.title: great homeshop saw
customer_reviews.text: The saw came in perfect condition. It took about 3 hours to put together.the instructions were very clear and the assembly was effortless.All factory set up was on the money and the only adjustment was the rifing knive to the blade. What a dream to use. From the first cut the saw works great. i built a four by 8 outfeed table and installed my router lift in the side table.What a pleasure to do wood working. Also the fence is very accurate. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene M. Tribuzio

product_meta.title: JET 708675PK XACTASAW Deluxe 3-Horsepower, 1Ph, 50-Inch Rip Fence
product_meta.description:
Style:50-Inch Rip FenceAMAZON.COM
The JET 708675PK XACTA SAW Deluxe 3 HP, 1Ph, 50-Inch Rip Fence is a high-performance cabinet saw with a full range of high-end, innovative features. Featuring a quick-release riving knife and integrated arbor lock for safe, efficient operation, this powerful machine is one of the most accurate, most versatile, and smoothest-running cabinet saws currently on the market. It includes an enclosed cabinet with a built-in sealed storage drawer.



Large Cast-Iron Table and Trunnion for Versatile, Vibration-Free Operation
The XACTA features a large, finely ground cast-iron table measuring 29 x 42 inches (with extensions) to provide plenty of work surface for large jobs, including 10 inches of clear table in front of the fully raised blade. Under the table you'll find a heavy-duty, wide-stance cast-iron trunnion mechanism--the heart of the saw's remarkable performance, stability, and nearly vibration-free operation.Conveniently Mounted Operating Mechanism for Easy Miter Slot Alignment
The XACTA's operating mechanism is conveniently mounted directly to the all-steel cabinet, which makes aligning the miter slot in the cast-iron table with the blade as easy as loosening four hex head cap screws, all of which are accessible from the outside.

Cast-Iron Handwheels for Precise Height Adjustments
Made using a pair of heavy, eight-inch diameter, cast-iron handwheels (with spinner handles) that operate machined worm gear drives, the bevel and blade height adjustments are precise, effortless, and designed to remain smooth after years of use. Even the locking pins at the center of each handwheel are all steel and precision-machined so that when they are applied there is no creep or change to that setting.

Left-Tilting Design for Safe, Burn-Free Bevel Cuts
The XACTA saw is a left-tilt machine, meaning the blade tilts away from the fence. When cutting bevels, this allows the scrap to fall freely onto the table and prevents your work piece from becoming trapped between the fence and the blade, ensuring safer, burn-free cuts.

Powerful 3 HP Motor and Poly V-Belt System for Smooth Operation
The XACTA comes equipped with a 3 HP motor (power rated based on continuous duty cycle) that's rigidly mounted directly to the under-table mechanism. Power is delivered to the blade through a pair of precisely machined pulleys and a super-efficient poly V-belt to provide smooth operation, resistance to slipping, and very low heat generation. Additionally, a push-button arbor lock allows for rapid blade changes.

Exclusive 50-Inch Commercial Fence for Improved Accuracy and Performance
The XACTA comes with an exclusive 50-inch commercial Fence II with T-square design to enhance accuracy, performance, and safety. It uses high-end materials that are precisely welded to make a tough, accurate fence system. For instance, the T-square head has simple adjuster screws and an adjustable magnified cursor built right in, and the locking mechanism is made from powdered metal parts for extended durability.

Industrial On/Off Switch to Protect the Motor
Fully wired internally, the XACTA includes an industrial magnetic on/off switch to protect the motor from dangerous power fluctuations. It also prevents the saw from restarting unexpectedly after a power failure by requiring the operator to press the "on" button to restart the saw.

Safety Features to Enhance Efficiency
The XACTA also comes with a high-tech modular blade guard, anti-kickback pawl, and riving knife assembly to improve efficiency and help keep you safe in a wide range of situations. Additionally, like the riving knife, the dust shroud is mounted to the same cast-iron boss as the blade. That means it "follows" the blade through height and bevel changes to maintain maximum effectiveness.

Full-Featured Miter Gauge for Precision and Consistency
Finally, the JET Deluxe XACTA Saw comes with a full-featured miter gauge with a 17 3/4-inch long bar that follows the miter slot smoothly and accurately. A disc at the bar's leading end engages the T-shaped miter slots and prevents the miter gauge from lifting during a cut. For added convenience, the miter gauge fence can turn 60 degrees left or right, and it locks easily at any point, including at the adjustable presets of 90 and 45 degrees, with a twist of the handle.

The XACTA measures 36 x 38 x 85 inches, weighs 510 pounds, and is covered by a five-year warranty.

About JET: A History of Sharing New, Feature-Rich Products
Opened in 1958 after the founder of the company, Leslie P. Sussman, took the first Boeing Jet Airplane trip from Seattle, Washington to Japan, JET began as a small dealer that sold air hoists and trolleys out of a single hardware store in Seattle. Over the years, JET has carried everything from snowmobiles, transmitter radios, and forklifts to nylon stockings, but by the early 1970s, metalworking had become the base of their business line. And by the 1980s, JET had expanded into the realm of woodworking. Today, you'll find that JET offers a wide range of popular woodworking tools that are backed with best-in-class features and excellent service.

What's in the Box
Saw, 50-Inch XACTA Fence II (708675PK).




FROM THE MANUFACTURER
If you've ever wondered about what a tablesaw can really do, look no further. Introducing the new JET¿ 10" DELUXE XACTA¿ SAW. The Quick release riving knife and integrated arbor lock keeps the operator safe and more efficient. The DELUXE XACTA¿ SAW offers an upgraded Poly-V belt drive system for smooth operation and optimal power transfer, a fully shrouded blade for highly efficient dust collection. The 26" x 30" wings and deeper table gives you even more cast iron to work on. A built-in 12.5" x 18" x 4 " storage drawer sealed from the cabinet keeps your necessities within arms reach, also includes an on-board fence and miter gauge storage.
feature_bullets: Quick release riving knife greatly reduces binding or kickback risk
Push button arbor lock for rapid blade change
Poly-V drive belt system delivers efficient, quiet operation
Left tilt, wide stance heavy-duty trunnion for stability and smooth blade positioning
Enclosed cabinet with built-in sealed storage drawer

specifications.Included Components: Fence, blade, tablesaw, miter gauge, rails, riving knife, blade guard
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars27 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
